name: BrainUP 1010
description:
BrainUP 1010 is a Puzzle / Board game where your mission is to put shapes in a 10 by 10 board, forming rows or columns making them disappear,

keeping the board as clean as possible. Why? Because if you don't have space for a new shape, the Game is Over. You can get better scores by doing miltiple lines in a move and be the best among your friends and around the world!

Good luck, we really hope you enjoy it!!

Features:

- 2 Game modes, including time mode!

- High Score Leaderboards

- Achievements

- Social networks integrated

Get Ready to BrainUP!
